events.title: Super Sunday Service
events.description: Join us for an explicit time in God's presence.

pastorMrs.name: Pastor Mrs. Inkechi Renee J.P.
pastorMrs.bio: A pillar of strength and grace, Pastor Mrs. Inkechi Renee serves alongside her husband with a heart full of love for God's people. She is a mentor to many women and a voice of wisdom.
pastorMrs.ministriesBio: She leads the 'Deborah's Arising' movement, empowering women to take their place in ministry and the marketplace.

pastor.name: Jude Peters Ndukwe
pastor.title: Senior Pastor
pastor.bioShort: Passionate about raising a generation of kings and priests.
pastor.bioLong: Pastor Jude Peters Chuckwuebuka is a dynamic minister of the Gospel, dedicated to raising a generation of kingdom ambassadors who are empowered to take over systems and sectors for Christ. With a unique calling to bridge the gap between ancient spirituality and modern relevance, he serves as a beacon of hope and transformation.

impact.title: Educational Outreach
impact.description: Providing scholarships to underprivileged students to ensure no child is left behind.

impact.title: Medical Missions
impact.description: Free medical checkups and treatments for rural communities.

impact.title: Widows Empowerment
impact.description: Skill acquisition programs and financial support for widows.
